ui-settings-overlay-tooltip: Move the overlay by dragging the colored bar on the left
ui-settings-overlay-autohide: Show overlay only while in queue or FATE occurs
ui-notification-overlay-autohide:
This option will be appplied after waiting queue state changes or new FATE occurs.
Restarting the application also make immediate appliance.

While waiting for client connection, overlay is shown.
(To notice user whether application is working well or not.)
ui-settings-iconflash: FFXIV icon blinks when duty matched/FATE occurs
ui-settings-cheatroulette: Show actual matched duty when using Duty Roulette
ui-settings-copymacro: Automatically copy macro from duty data when duty matched
ui-settings-usevpn: don't Filter local network connection (VPN, etc)
ui-settings-usevpn-alert: Normally, you have to turn off this option to capture network packet.
ui-settings-fatesound:
Enable FATE notification sound
(disables custom sound)
ui-3rdparty-twitter-about:
When a queue pops or FATE occurs, 
send a Tweet with a mention to this Twitter account.
Enter the Twitter Account except the preceding symbol @.
ui-3rdparty-telegram-about:
When a queue pops or FATE occurs, send a message to this Telegram chat room.
You can get your Chat ID if you send any message to DFAssist Telegram Bot.
ui-3rdparty-discord-numberonly-alert: Discord ID is only number accepted.
ui-3rdparty-discord-about:
Notify via Discord message with a mention to this Discord ID.
Enter your over 15-digit number Discord ID.

To check Discord ID: Enter !id command on #get-discord-id channel in DFAssist Discord Server. DFAssist Bot will reply your Discord ID.
Also, you should be in the DFAssist Discord Server to get notification.
ui-advanced-http-readme:
When enabled, DFAssistwill send a POST HTTP Request with 
"status" and "info" to the specified URL.
"status"is sent with a string called "duty-match" or "fate-occured".
"info" is sent with the Matched Duty Name or Occured FATE Name.

This feature is scheduled to be updated more.
ui-fate-about:
Select the FATEs you wish to receive notification for, then press the "Apply" button.
Alerts only function when you are in the zone for those FATEs

ui-language-changed:
Language changed to English.
Overlay language will be applied after queue status changes.
Please restart the application for it to fully take effect right away.
ui-cheat-roulette-confirm:
This function is disabled by default to prevent abuse.
Please refrain from deliberately withdrawing from a duty just because you dislike it.

Do you still want to enable it?
ui-cheat-roulette-enabled:
Enabled.
Please DON'T deliberately withdraw from duties because you dislike them.
ui-app-crashed:
Application exited due to unknown issue.

Error: {0}

l-process-found-nothing: P: Could not find FFXIV process.
l-process-found-multiple: P: 2 or more FFXIV processes are running.
l-twitter-failed-request: R: Error occured while requesting tweet
l-telegram-failed-request: R: Error occured while requesting telegram message
l-telegram-failed-general: R: Failed to send telegram message: {0}
l-discord-failed-request: R: Error occured while requesting discord message
l-discord-failed-general: R: Failed to send discord message: {0}
l-updater-error-data: U: Error while updating duty/FATE Data
l-updater-error-check: U: Could not find update information.
l-updater-error-no-url: U: Could not find update file.
l-updater-error-downloading: U: Error while getting update data
l-data-updated: D: Duty/FATE data updated to version {0}.
l-data-error: D: Error occured while processing duty/FATE data
l-network-started: N: Started reading of FFXIV network packets
l-network-starting: N: Starting to read FFXIV packets...
l-network-stopped: N: Stopped reading FFXIV network packets
l-network-stopping: N: Stopping reading of FFXIV network reading...
l-network-error-no-connection: N: Could not find FFXIV server connection
l-network-error-finding-lobby: N: Error while receeving lobby server information
l-network-detected-connection-closing: N: Detected disconnect from FFXIV servers
